CustomField.formula: IF(Requested_Day_Of_Week__c == 'Sunday', Request_Date__c + 2, IF(Requested_Day_Of_Week__c == 'Saturday', Request_Date__c + 3, IF(Requested_Day_Of_Week__c == 'Monday' || Requested_Day_Of_Week__c == 'Tuesday' || Requested_Day_Of_Week__c == 'Wednesday', Request_Date__c + 2, IF(Requested_Day_Of_Week__c == 'Thursday', Request_Date__c + 4, IF(Requested_Day_Of_Week__c == 'Friday', Request_Date__c + 4, null) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: 2 Days from requested date
